website_summaries.verdict: The Transcend SSD370S is an affordable and satisfying upgrade for any computers that still run on a hard drive.
pros: The Transcend SSD370S delivers fast performance at low cost, has high durability and features data encryption
cons: The three-year guarantee is short compared to the five- to 10-year warranties of competing drives

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Hard Drive since November 2015, and it worked great until yesterday. They it literally stopped working entirely. It will not boot, will not show up under the bios,nothing. I have hard drives SSD and otherwise that are way older than this and still function, but this broke just shy of 4 years (and naturally 8 months after the warranty expired). Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Wawrzonek

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD for the $$!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to put in a spare desktop pc, (Dell Inspirion 530, which I had purchased in 2007) to replace a failing Hard Drive. Reinstalled Windows 10 on this and she is running like a dream in conjunction with a 1TB WD Black! I use this pc to sync my ipods, and for that, it's perfect now! While this SSD does not come with software to transfer the OS, I prefer to do a clean install sometimes to clear out all the clutter. This SSD is fast! A definite recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought two SSDs in November 2015--a SanDisk for a gaming computer that I rarely use, and this one, for my laptop which I use heavily. A little over three years later--SanDisk's warranty period, though I'm sure that's a coincidence--the SanDisk SSD died a death. Even the BIOS cannot see it. This one is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Transcend is the best price/performance balance to be found in static memory. I've had tremendous success with their CF and SD cards in the past, and continuously use them heavily over many years now. So, it was with little hesitation that I bought three of these drives. One of them breathed new life into an aging Windows 7 computer, and the other two I'm using in a professional video recording device. They have all been trouble-free and speedy as advertised. I'm sold on Transcend!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 256GB is not much for gaming unless you store your games elsewhere. **READ**
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a budget upgrade about 5 years ago. It's still running strong to this day. I've filled it up several times, installed and uninstalled many large storage taking games on it. reinstalled windows probably 10 times at least (due to other issues not related to the ssd) and this drive is still going. It's not much for storage if you're playing newer games that require a lot of space, I use it for the OS and apps, games are stored on a larger ssd now. Definitely recommend this brand ssd overall. Boot time is around 7-12 seconds for me and always been the same.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Michael

customer_reviews.title: High Speed
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very fast. Had some trouble because the drive needed formatting. Windows 10 could not do it. Normal utilities on Ubuntu also failed. Finally used GParted to format the drive to NTFS. Now it works normally.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Husband

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fast, and works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much the price has gone down on these 512GB SSD drives and this had been a great buy for my old laptop upgrades from old and slow 5,400 rpm drives that they put in those MacBook Pro. Well, technically I didn't want to spend arm and leg for SSD drive through Apple and this was simple and alternative solution for my laptop! Replacement process wasn't too bad and after cloning/mirroring my drive and plugged back in, WOW i can't believe it was so fast during the boot process. It actually cut down more than half of boot up time. I'm glad that I chose this drive.
customer_reviews.author: #1Dad@AMZ

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like this little drive. I had a $30 SSD that would hang due to the shoddy controller in it. This one does not have the issues so spend the extra $5-$10 and get this one. I use it as an OS drive and have 2 Raptors in RAID 0 for my games and it flies!
customer_reviews.author: Choose901

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Fast
customer_reviews.text: Makes my old Samsung 830 look stuttery and sluggish. I've thoroughly enjoyed Transcends SD cards for almost a decade now, and they still haven't let me down. Their SSDs are continuing that trend.
customer_reviews.author: dedla

customer_reviews.title: First SSD Install
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing a lot of different SSD's, I decided to go with this one due to price and reviews. I'm not a 'techie' but I have built a computer and can do some of the basic work. It was easy to install and get up and running. I used Macrium to clone my drive since there were a few people that said the Transcend version was either tough to use, or somehow resulted in them losing data. Everything went smooth first time through. My PC boots up and opens all the programs much faster now. Definitely a worthy upgrade/investment.
customer_reviews.author: juts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for an Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed this on sale for $62.99 to use with my Xbox One. I have a 5TB external drive for most of my game installs, and I use this one for whichever games I'm playing currently. Lots of current-gen games suffer from lengthy load times and this drive has cut them down typically by half during my testing. If I can save a few minutes out of every gaming session, it'll pay for itself in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie J.

customer_reviews.title: Turned a good Computer into something I can brag about.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on sale. My computer went from 1 min totally loading to seeing my desktop within 12 seconds of powering up. Best purchase for a older computer to give some speed back. By far Transcend has the most reasonable prices for solid state drives. I plan on replacing all of my drives with the 1TB solid state.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: If you need an SSD this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.text: This little beauty was purchased to replace a 1TB hard drive and it is functioning perfectly. I only have essentials on it like programs and important documents/files. It is very fast and quiet. Upon installing into my Lenovo IdeaCentre B750, I noticed every program opening within 2-4 seconds; even Photoshop or Adobe Illustrator. If you need an SSD this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.  Died after 7 months  of light use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in August 2015...now it is February 2016. Went to boot the PC and got garbled screen with a barely readable "repairing hard drive" message. Now PC is dead...system comes on and hard drive access light comes on but will not boot. Totally unacceptable. Not abused at all...babied actually...in PC with multiple coolers to make sure no overheating and shut down nightly, so no excessive use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenated new life into my 2009 Thinkpad tablet
customer_reviews.text: Ready for the Thinkpad x200 Tablet making it a viable PC capable of doing more than a modern Surface Prowhether I choose Windows 10 or 8. Microsoft Office, Adobe Photoshop and Acrobat open almost instantly, large data sorts and masking operations finish unprecedentedly fast. SSD's run at room temperature and significantly reduces your laptops cooling fan requirements. The lower temp improvements significantly increases your battery capacity, in my case by an extra hour while still in "Max Performance" mode.
customer_reviews.author: What the hell is that smell !

customer_reviews.title: Made a 6-year old computer like new again!
customer_reviews.text: Put it in my Toshiba Laptop A505-S6980 and it fit perfectly. It was easy to install and load the system right onto it. It had no problems recognizing the drive and it's pretty much made my laptop new again. It's speed is great and boots up in less than 30 secs. All my programs launch fast and I haven't had any issues with it! All in all, really happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: eatablog

customer_reviews.title: More of an Upgrade than you would suspect
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 'mechanical' drive in an older laptop - principally as a defensive measure. After watching this drive 'grind' for years (I suspect an addiction to over indexing), I was concerned about life expectancy. Going to an SSD was a remarkable upgrade - I had no idea the impact of the drive on starting up browsers or just booting the laptop itself. The new solid state drive literally makes an old laptop 'new' again.
customer_reviews.author: Rock of Ages

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and great price. I don't know how long it will ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and great price. I don't know how long it will hold up but I'm using it for the OS; cloning was a pain though but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Therevieweryouneed

customer_reviews.title: so good! I bought this for my parents computer as ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I bought this for my parents computer as startup was insanely slow with the old western digital 320 gig hard drive. Decided to get them a solid state drive, and this thing flies! Bought it based off of the good reviews, so here's hoping it lasts and works well for them!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great little drive for running Hyper-V Server 2012R2
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drive to boot Hyper-V server on a Dell T610 server, plugged into one of the SATA ports on the motherboard, and it works perfect for this. Using this SSD is much easier to setup than loading Hyper-V on a USB flash drive, and about 1/2 the cost (At the time I purchased it they were ~$43.00) of the USB flash drives on Microsoft's recommended hardware list. It has been running 24/7 for 7 months now without a single error or retired block showing in the S.M.A.R.T. data.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Test setup: Xbox One Inateck USB enclosure with USAP support Result: Works great. The Xbox found the hard drive without any issue. All the games are installed on this drive. Did not have any issue with it even with a hard gaming session. Games boot, installed, and run are noticeably faster than using either the internal hard drive or an external mechanical hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: tinman

customer_reviews.title: it had worked fine in my macbook for a year but suddenly failed ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it had worked fine in my macbook for a year but suddenly failed yesterday. The good part is that I have been using the original hard drive as a backup so no data lost hopefully. I should have named this drive "permanent" instead "transient" - my fault. reformat the disk and reinstall the system now. Hope it works! Otherwise it's nice that this thing carries 3 years warranty. Would be happier if it is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: John Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great mechanical HDD replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a PC I sold to a friend! Maybe not the fastest, but gets the job done better than a mechanical HDD!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Swindell

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective upgrade to an aging laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great drive - was a very easy upgrade for our Asus laptop that my wife was at wits end with due to its slllooowww performance. I used EASEUS and a USB--ESATA cable to clone my old drive onto the new one. Aside from adding RAM, switching to an SSD is probably the best upgrade you can perform to add new life to an old computer. Windows now boots in seconds, not minutes, and overall performance has increased considerably.
customer_reviews.author: MadeInDetroit

customer_reviews.title: which was pretty awesome several years ago
customer_reviews.text: I was comparing performance metric for different brands (at different prices), but the numbers don't actually mean anything to me. So I looked up the metrics for the thing I was used to, a Western Digital VelociRaptor drive, which was pretty awesome several years ago. This drive performs an order of magnitude better than that, so I saved my money and bought this one over the premium alternative.
customer_reviews.author: David McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but fast SSD, worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality drive for the price. Did exactly what I needed it to do. I installed it on my girlfriends 8 year old computer to run the OS and as expected it made her PC feel like a new computer again. Its running at least 10 times faster.
customer_reviews.author: jjlinke18

customer_reviews.title: A Good and cheap SSD for office or kitchen computer
customer_reviews.text: Order this for Office computer upgrade, since we do mostly network file saving, so 120gb is more than enough for daily operation. I do feel the difference between this ssd and crucial mx ssd that I have at home, but for office use, it is definitely good enough. Gotta love the fact that it also come with a 3.5mm bracket in case you are using it on desktop tower.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Y

customer_reviews.title: Product is good.  Amazon not good for wrong description.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. However had one problem. Description says 470mb/s write. That spec is for 256gb and above. Amazon clearly has it wrong. If I would have known I would have bought the plextor m6v.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect external drive for Xbox One!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add to my Xbox One to help speed up load times and improve Fallout 4 performance. Used it with a USB 3.0 tool-free enclosure and it was connected and formatted in no time. Oh, FYI... It totally cut the saving, loading and transition times in Fallout 4. I would buy Transcend again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget SSD
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a couple of moths with no issues so far. Read/Write speeds are as advertised (and as high as you could expect for a Sata SSD), and this being an MLC nand drive (meaning longer lifespan than the now common TLC SSDs) there are no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Who really needs all those goggle-bits?
customer_reviews.text: It has just enough space for an OS without all the chaff. We use these in our test systems.
customer_reviews.author: SuperBrian

customer_reviews.title: Game-Changer
customer_reviews.text: Made a HUGE difference in my fairly new HP Pavilion 15" with AMD A10 processor. The startup time was slashed down to a couple seconds. I do a lot of Photoshop for my job and I can save and move files around MUCH faster. Applications also open much faster so that's a huge plus. I got it during the Black Friday sale so it was also 60 some dollars, and it was definitely worth it. I wish I would have bought another for my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Huse

customer_reviews.title: Replacement/Upgrade drive for mini pc
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on one of those deals of the day sales Amazon routinely has. Sat in the box for a couple weeks, and finally installed it on my mini pc this past weekend. It was replacing a traditional 7200rpm drive, so it was an instant improvement. It's currently running CentOS 7 OS, and I haven't noticed anything glitches or funny behavior with the system.
customer_reviews.author: Leo K

customer_reviews.title: Mounting bracket not included.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice SSD for the price. I only gave it 3 stars because it did not come with a mounting bracket as stated in the description. I'm disappointed that I'll now need to make a separate purchase for that item.
customer_reviews.author: novak64

customer_reviews.title: Got a steal of a deal on a lightning sale ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a steal of a deal on a lightning sale and it really gave me the capacity I needed on my desktop at work for a fraction of the price. Doesn't feel as snappy as my old samsung on startup, but it's hardly noticeable really. Once loaded up, there's no discernible difference.
customer_reviews.author: chuckycheeze

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to my expectation...
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot to get the product immediately after my order placement.. When it delivered, I installed right away to see the best performance with expectation. However, I'm not satisfied with the quality. Since the day I installed, my laptop is showing freezing and buffering on and off. So I had to install Window OS several times, in fact 12 TIMES. But it didn't make a change and I don't think it will be different. I might need to go to repair center.
customer_reviews.author: dohyeon kim

customer_reviews.title: Have had this SSD for 2 years. No problems ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this SSD for 2 years. No problems. The SSD is a bit slower than some other brands but is also cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and quick - What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: The drive is very fast, especially for the price. I usually get about 350 MB/s write speed in a normal, working environment, though it benchmarks higher on tests. The average boot speed is about 14-17 seconds, with minimal start up tasks. I was very impressed with the drive and I have not experienced any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: ITs OK
customer_reviews.text: I like it but at the same time I don't feel like my PC started loading and working wayyy faster. so in my opinion its working OK but I don't see performance increase
customer_reviews.author: Andrei L

customer_reviews.title: Speeds up 4 year old windows laptop
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a hard drive on a 2011 HP 15 inch laptop now running Windows 10. Excellent speeds. Start up is now less than 10 seconds. Shut down is very fast. Read and write speeds are great and much faster than the old spinning harddrive even though that ran at 7200 rpm's. The only thing I would do differently is get a 1 TB drive.
customer_reviews.author: Modesto buyer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Drive!
customer_reviews.text: fastest SSD I have owned so far. also largest capacity I have tried. loaded image of a clean Win 10 upgrade (from clean Win 7 Pro) and installed in Dell E6420 (i5, 4GB RAM). after POST Win 10 comes up in about 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: devhead

customer_reviews.title: Love the speed!
customer_reviews.text: Love SSD disks! Much faster than any spinnning disk, and much less power hungry for better laptop battery life. This Transcend disk took a bit of finagling to get it to fit into my Inspiron 1520 and make proper contact, but once I got it in there right, it's been bullet proof ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: 5-STARS!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet drive! Huge bang for the buck and even at this low price it comes with a 3.5" adapter tray! Call me a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SSD. Bought it on a crazy Amazon deal ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome SSD. Bought it on a crazy Amazon deal and have been very happy with it. One of the few Amazon purchases that have made me very happy in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Used in my Dell Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Replaced this with a failed drive in my Dell Laptop. It's cool that it does not make any noise and has a lot of storage (depending on which one is purchased). Computer is running faster than when I first bought the computer
customer_reviews.author: BPM

customer_reviews.title: Great drive, good speed, and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 512gb model to replace my 256gb OCZ Vertex 4. I used Disk Utility to image my old to the new and it's working without issue. I'm getting 250MB/sec compared to the 255MB/sec of the Vertex 4. My mac is a mid 2010 so I only get Sata II speeds. All in all I don't notice a difference at that rate and would recommend the drive especially with the special I got it at over the holidays. I'm not sure if imaging brought over the trim option being on but I did not have to run trimforce to turn on trim support.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Matz

customer_reviews.title: WoW.....
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fast. Blazzing speed.. Games load faster, windows boot faster, files are easily accessible .. And for such an affordable price, well i think i have robbed them! I didn't have to use the included bracket tho.. I will buy it again. Highly recommended especially if you are on a budget...
customer_reviews.author: Heranlall Sukhlall

customer_reviews.title: Much faster than HDD and made her computer like new again + UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Wife doesn't use much storage, this worked for her. Speed is ok. Much faster than HDD and made her computer like new again. UPDATE: Just purchased 2 more for my NAS to use as SSD Caching. Installed and seem to be working perfectly. VERY HAPPY with this SSD!
customer_reviews.author: Stebs

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable SSD
customer_reviews.text: I use this drive as my primary for Windows 10 Pro, and it has worked flawlessly since installation. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. McIllece

customer_reviews.title: 3.5-inch mounting kit - it's actually a joke
customer_reviews.text: This SSD includes a 3.5-inch mounting kit - it's actually a joke. Mounting adapter should be longer to correspond regular 3.5-inch drive size. As result you can't firmly mount this drive placed in mounting kit in regular 3.5" desktop slot - only 2 holes fit
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a portable usb enclosure and use it in my car with a usb stand alone wifi dongle for entertainment for my kids, they use the app for the dongle and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and very good price
customer_reviews.text: Fast and very good price. 3.5" metallic adapter a welcome plus
customer_reviews.author: Sebas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SSD
customer_reviews.text: Great SSD, easy set up. What I did was I installed my Windows 7 onto the SSD and left my other HDDs for movies, games, etc. The SSD is super fast and reliable, I have yet to have a problem with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: works perfect since then
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with this drive, replaced by Transcend under warranty. No more issues, works perfect since then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great drive!
customer_reviews.text: This drive is extremely fast for the money. I purchased this as a deal of the day for 60 bucks and I am extremely happy with my purchase. It is woken up my older laptop and made it feel like a new machine. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JW tucson

customer_reviews.title: if Sata III is your only option then this isn't a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: Go with an M.2 first, if Sata III is your only option then this isn't a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Cpain

customer_reviews.title: No compatibility problems will be very satisfied. I want to buy one more for the ...
customer_reviews.text: No compatibility problems will be very satisfied. I want to buy one more for the same price. When do you sell discount?
customer_reviews.author: kim jun tae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but not a lot of options on ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but not a lot of options on what to clone with the software that came with it. Didn't come with all the screws it was supposed to but that's not a huge negative since the drive is so small and light. Huge improvement in speed on an old machine without the high cost. I will probably buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tossed this in an older HP touchsmart desktop and it definitely made everything SNAPPIER!
customer_reviews.author: A. Truong

customer_reviews.title: Speed is good, and the software that you download is good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale so the price was right. I have a Samsung 256GB as a OS/boot drive. This is being used for gaming, and my 1TB WD is storage now. No complaints. Speed is good, and the software that you download is good, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Nemesiis

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my MAC Book Pro (2006) 500 HDD, worked great Crtl-R at reboot and I was ready to rock with a restore. The format and config was auto matic. You'll need any licenses or config settings.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great little SSD.
customer_reviews.text: These drives seem great. Added to a Dell M2800 via a Hard Drive Caddy replacing the DVD and doubling my storage space. I was able to move 77 GB of data from the primary drive to this drive in under 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: S. Corrow

customer_reviews.title: Once the virtual machine was removed it worked great but it took me a lot of time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble with software. It will not copy the disk drive if there is a virtual machine on your PC. Once the virtual machine was removed it worked great but it took me a lot of time to figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Dagger

customer_reviews.title: Zoom Zoom Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I was luck enough to grab this when it was on sale for $100. Soon enough, that will be the every-day price. It's amazing how much faster my 2008 MacPro tower runs with this SSD. My aps load easily 150% faster.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Knell

customer_reviews.title: Nice bump in speed when booting to Win 10.
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily. And it works well. I cloned Win 10 to this drive and noticed a big improvement in speed, especially when the PC is booting up to Win 10.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Bill

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Stable. Will get another for a RAID setup.
customer_reviews.text: As fast and stable as the day I got it. A great budget SSD for getting your feet wet into solid state hardware. I use it as a scratch disk for Photoshop and After Effects with noticeable speed improvements over my WD Black HDD.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought during sale. Amazing drive that fast and reliable. Such a great value for great quality. Would buy again over other brands in similar price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ju-Miao Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Im using it as a boot drive with ubuntu server installed. This thing flies.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. Fit and installed without any problem. Working like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Delpleche

customer_reviews.title: A worthly upgrade for older HDDs
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my daughter's S400 HD with this one. It was the same size so cloning was easy. The low profile fit perfectly and the speed was SCALES better than the old HDD that was in there. It made the S400 feel like a new laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: and it's best for that price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for $24.99 , and it's best for that price.I want to buy the second one but the price is higher now, and i can buy 120gb ssd for almost the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy on sale!
customer_reviews.text: After a full day of use read/write, I am very pleased. I bought an enclosure for few dollar and now, I have a portable hard drive that is light and not fragile
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a boot drive and I love the speed of it booting up. Fast Windows.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Low Priced Drive.......
customer_reviews.text: Good, Fast Drive.. I've used it now for 3 weeks and having no complaints about it.. It was one of the lowest priced drives in that size..
customer_reviews.author: TimeSpaceGuy

customer_reviews.title: fast drive - easy clone
customer_reviews.text: Clone software worked well and drive is very fast. boot time is down below 30 seconds and multi-tasking has gotten a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It's still running after a year of owning it, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's still running after a year of owning it, while running my OS and installing all my SW on it.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: ... an SSD as the primary drive and it's performed wonderfully so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade my desktop with an SSD as the primary drive and it's performed wonderfully so far. Overall performance improvement over the standard hard drive is easy to notice and I also feel the price was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Broadwater

customer_reviews.title: Get this drive!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome SSD for the price. It's a significant upgrade from a traditional spinning hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love i, t use it for my OS and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love i,t use it for my OS and a few games!. Going to order another or two...fast
customer_reviews.author: August Embry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price, and have had no problems. Fast enough for an old Linux box.
customer_reviews.author: Tomy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good drives
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four of these for the RS815 NAS. The whole setup has performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: New as advertised, Installed perfectly, Good Reseller for brand name media devices in new sealed condition
customer_reviews.text: New as advertised, Installed perfectly, Good Reseller for brand name media devices in new sealed condition
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Drive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drive. My only regret is not buying a larger capacity one, so that I wouldn't have to bother re-organizing files to go into my other HDDs, which make noise once activated. This drive is completely silent and only the case, GPU and CPU fans make faint noise. Only, after setting up my new system, did I realize just how much noise my two WD HDD make in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: GF Astoria NY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Made my new system with Windows 10 a screamer as far as boot and access. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sheeley

customer_reviews.title: NICE SSD
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent SSD I have ever used. I bought it with black Friday discount, I am so glad to see the discount at that time. It works perfectly fine with my Lenovo laptop. The sequential READ and WRITE speed match the claim. I have no complain with the price and the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Yiu Fung MUI

customer_reviews.title: Use for MIrror Backup of Computer's C:\ System Drive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drive to backup my current SSD C:\ drive using a mirror app. Worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Super fast just as a solid state should
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Super fast just as a solid state should. I have all my games installed and works like a jiffy. One time I opened my computer thinking it was just from a sleep mode. But when restarting it took 8 seconds from clicking restart to back to desktop. I counted.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love solid state drives and this one is a bargain! i'll be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a back-up for my Mac and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This SSD is a little faster than the Samsung. I use it as a back-up for my Mac and it's perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: legit, needed a 2nd small drive for an embedded OS and so far (3 months) it's worked like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: nice SSD, does exactly what I needed it to do at a competitive price! put it into a Lenovo l440 laptop.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Good price, item worked without issue and computer seems very fast.
customer_reviews.author: RickyPetite

customer_reviews.title: New life for 8 year old lappy
customer_reviews.text: Fast even though my old lappy only has a SATA 1 interface. It made an unusable laptop usable again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make your old pc like new
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the drive in an old dell pc will a dual core processor. Boot time is under 10 seconds! Great way to repurpose an old PC.
customer_reviews.author: matthewbrowne

customer_reviews.title: boot in seconds and open apps at lightning speed
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one - making my 2012 Mac and 2013 HP each boot in seconds and opening apps at lightning speed.
customer_reviews.author: careful buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an even better price! The best thing I've ever done for my pc! It's super fast! It maxed out the "Windows Experience Index" at 7.9 for hard drive performance! Great product! I'd give it a 10!
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Borders

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional SSD at a respectable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good SSD and with the downloaded software you can copy everything from your OS disk if the total items are smaller than the available disk space. The new drive is much faster to boot and everything that I tried to move to the SSD was much faster. Today (11/27/16) I received another one BUT it will not transfer the OS to this drive. Hopefully the support people at Transend will tell me how to unfreeze the SSD drive,
customer_reviews.author: Fastphoto

customer_reviews.title: Very nice drive at a goof price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drive at a goof price. I haven't done any bench marks, but this is not a speed demon or anything, its a very practical drive, more utilitarian than a spec monster.
